summary: Juanita Reyes is identified as a character reference for Manuel Marti in November 1968. Several attempts were made to contact her to verify information about Marti. Initial efforts to reach her by telephone and at her listed address were unsuccessful. An agent report indicates she no longer resided at the provided address and had reportedly returned to Puerto Rico. A physical check at an address in the Bronx, New York, also yielded negative results. Eventually, contact was made with Reyes, who stated she did not know Manuel Marti.
significance: Juanita Reyes' significance lies in her role as a listed character reference for Manuel Marti, who was under investigation. The attempts to verify her connection to Marti and her subsequent denial of knowing him are documented, suggesting an effort to assess Marti's background and associations.
